wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Welcome to Salient, a Beautiful & Robust WordPress Theme.
Take your website with you. Salient is ultra responsive and displays amazing on-the-go!
We have been told we do work actually worth sharing

Basically, we're awesome.
What else really needs to be said?

Your eyes are not playing tricks on you.
Video backgrounds are natively supported
in our exclusive & touch-friendly Nectar Slider.

The New Amazing Nectar Page Builder
Click Anywhere To Discover More
Are you ready to show off & make some jaws drop?

GeoWolf brings new possibilities
for staying connected with friends.

We're A Creative Agency Located
In The Heart Of New York City
Loaded with exclusive and beautiful features, Salient allows you to build a website that will have your visitors drooling from the moment they enter.

Every site should have its own unique design to it. Salient gives you the power you need to truly create something different!

Introducing The AJAX Shopping Cart

Another cool feature that Salient offers is the AJAX shopping cart. When enabled, users will have immediate feedback after adding items to their cart in your WooCommerce shop. They will also have access to view the contents of their cart without ever leaving or refreshing the page. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/full_width_section]
